bibl.title: The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World.
bibl.note: 9 contributions by Australian scholars in homage to the Library's legacy. - Introduction: Alexandria in History and Myth (by Roy MacLEOD). - Part I. Alexandria in History and Myth. - Part II. Scholarship in the Alexandrian Manner. - Bibliography. Index.
bibl.seg: MacLEOD Roy (Ed.), The Library of Alexandria, Centre of Learning in the Ancient World.
London - New York, I.B. Tauris, 2000, 8°, xii-196 pp., 1 carte. ISBN 1-86064-428-7. £39.50.
